title: Ground News - Long-awaited kosher and halal options to become available in New York state prison
text:
Summary by Ground News Gov. Kathy Hochul signed a bill guaranteeing religiously appropriate food items in prison commissaries and visiting area vending machines. The law is set to go into effect next September. The availability of kosher and halal food in prisons is often the subject of lawsuits that reference the Religious Land Use and Institutionalized Persons Act of 2000. Share menu More
